languages.text: "К сожалению, в сонме Человечества находятся и те, кто готов пресмыкаться перед нашими врагами в надежде на ценную награду. Возможно, вам будет интересно, что мы вышли на след подобных еретиков..." {n}Ахиллеас бросает взгляд на инфопластину.{/n} "Разоренная пустотная станция в системе Пояс Лангренна, по многочисленным свидетельствам, служит базой для своры пиратов, не гнушающихся сделками с ксеносами. Я не сумел убедить канцлера в необходимости отправить туда корабль, но... возможно, вы сами захотите нанести визит вежливости этим мерзавцам?"

"Unfortunately, in the host of Humanity there are those who are willing to grovel before our enemies in the hopes of a valuable reward. You may be interested to know that we are on the trail of such heretics..." {n}Achilleas glances at a data-slate.{/n} "Overwhelming evidence indicates that a plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt is being used as a base by a band of pirates who are not above dealing with xenos. I was unable to persuade the chancellor of the need to dispatch a ship there, but... perhaps you would like to pay a courtesy call to these scoundrels yourself?"
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, в сонме Человечества находятся и те, кто готов пресмыкаться перед нашими врагами в надежде на ценную награду. Возможно, вам будет интересно, что мы вышли на след подобных еретиков..." {n}Ахиллеас бросает взгляд на инфопластину.{/n} "Разоренная пустотная станция в системе Пояс Лангренна, по многочисленным свидетельствам, служит базой для своры пиратов, не гнушающихся сделками с ксеносами. traits.locale_text: "Unfortunately, in the host of Humanity there are those who are willing to grovel before our enemies in the hopes of a valuable reward. You may be interested to know that we are on the trail of such heretics..." {n}Achilleas glances at a data-slate.{/n} "Overwhelming evidence indicates that a ruined void station in Langrenn's Belt is being used as a base by a band of pirates who are not above dealing with xenos. I was unable to persuade the chancellor of the need to dispatch a ship there, but... perhaps you would like to pay a courtesy call to these scoundrels yourself?"

You may be interested to know that we are on the trail of such heretics..." {n}Achilleas glances at a data-slate.{/n} "Overwhelming evidence indicates that a marauded void station in Langrenn's Belt is being used as a base by a band of pirates who are not above dealing with xenos. I was unable to persuade the chancellor of the need to dispatch a ship there, but... perhaps you would like to pay a courtesy call to these scoundrels yourself?"

languages.text: “遗憾的是，一部分人类打算在我们的敌人面前卑躬屈膝，希望能得到新主人的赏赐。我们正在追踪这些异端分子，或许您对这方面的情报会感兴趣……”{n}阿吉里亚斯瞥了一眼数据板。{/n}“大量证据表明，朗恩之带有一虚空站遭到了劫掠，那里现在成了一伙海盗的基地。那群海盗会与异形打交道。我没办法说服宰相派遣一艘飞船过去，不过……或许您愿意屈尊亲自拜访一下这群恶棍？”
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, in the host of Humanity there are those who are willing to grovel before our enemies in the hopes of a valuable reward. You may be interested to know that we are on the trail of such heretics..." {n}Achilleas glances at a data-slate.{/n} "Overwhelming evidence indicates that a plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt is being used as a base by a band of pirates who are not above dealing with xenos. I was unable to persuade the chancellor of the need to dispatch a ship there, but... perhaps you would like to pay a courtesy call to these scoundrels yourself?"

“遗憾的是，一部分人类打算在我们的敌人面前卑躬屈膝，希望能得到新主人的赏赐。我们正在追踪这些异端分子，或许您对这方面的情报会感兴趣……”{n}阿吉里亚斯瞥了一眼数据板。{/n}“大量证据表明，朗恩之带有一虚空站遭到了劫持，那里现在成了一伙海盗的基地。那群海盗会与异形打交道。我没办法说服宰相派遣一艘飞船过去，不过……或许您愿意屈尊亲自拜访一下这群恶棍？”

languages.text: «Lamentablemente, en la Humanidad siempre habrá alguien dispuesto a arrastrarse ante nuestros enemigos esperando una gran recompensa. Tal vez le interese saber que seguimos el rastro de un grupo de herejes...». {n}Achilleas mira su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Tenemos pruebas abrumadoras de que una estación del vacío saqueada en el Cinturón de Langrenn sirve como base a una banda de piratas dispuestos a tratar con xenos. No he podido convencer a la canciller la necesidad de enviar una nave, pero... ¿podría visitar personalmente a esos rufianes?".
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, in the host of Humanity there are those who are willing to grovel before our enemies in the hopes of a valuable reward. You may be interested to know that we are on the trail of such heretics..." {n}Achilleas glances at a data-slate.{/n} "Overwhelming evidence indicates that a plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt is being used as a base by a band of pirates who are not above dealing with xenos. I was unable to persuade the chancellor of the need to dispatch a ship there, but... perhaps you would like to pay a courtesy call to these scoundrels yourself?"

traits.locale_text: «Lamentablemente, en la Humanidad siempre habrá alguien dispuesto a arrastrarse ante nuestros enemigos esperando una gran recompensa. Tal vez le interese saber que seguimos el rastro de un grupo de herejes...» {n}Achilleas mira su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Tenemos pruebas abrumadoras de que una estación del vacío saqueada en el Cinturón de Langrenn sirve como base a una banda de piratas dispuestos a tratar con xenos. No he podido convencer a la canciller la necesidad de enviar una nave, pero... ¿podría visitar personalmente a esos rufianes?".

languages.text: 「残念ながら、多くの人類は敵を前にすれば見返りを求めてひれ伏すつもりです。お知らせしておきたいのは、私達はこうした異端者どもを追跡しているのですが…」{n}アキレアスはデータスレートを一瞬見る。{/n}「膨大な量の証拠により、ラングレンズベルトで襲撃を受けたヴォイドステーションが海賊団の基地として使われていることが分かりました。その海賊団は異種族とも兵器の取引をしています。私ではそこへ船を出すよう議長を説得できませんでしたが…おそらく、陛下ならこのような悪党を、御自ら表敬されたいのではありませんか？」
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, in the host of Humanity there are those who are willing to grovel before our enemies in the hopes of a valuable reward. You may be interested to know that we are on the trail of such heretics..." {n}Achilleas glances at a data-slate.{/n} "Overwhelming evidence indicates that a plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt is being used as a base by a band of pirates who are not above dealing with xenos. I was unable to persuade the chancellor of the need to dispatch a ship there, but... perhaps you would like to pay a courtesy call to these scoundrels yourself?"

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、多くの人類は敵を前にすれば見返りを求めてひれ伏すつもりです。お知らせしておきたいのは、私達はこうした異端者どもを追跡しているのですが…」{n}アキレアスはデータスレートを一瞬見る。{/n}「膨大な量の証拠により、ラングレンズベルトで襲撃を受けたヴォイドステーションが海賊団の基地として使われていることが分かりました。その海賊団は異種族とも兵器の取引をしています。私ではそこへ船を出すよう議長を説得できませんでしたが…おそらく、陛下ならこのような悪党を、御自ら表敬されたいのではありませんか？」

languages.text: "Leider sind manche Menschen bereit, sich in der Hoffnung auf eine wertvolle Belohnung vor unseren Feinden in den Staub zu werfen. Es interessiert Euch vielleicht, dass wir einigen solcher Ketzer derzeit auf der Spur sind ..." {n}Achilleas wirft einen Blick auf einen Datablock.{/n} "Eindeutige Beweise deuten darauf hin, dass eine geplünderte Leerenstation in Langrenns Gürtel von einer Piratenbande, die auch mit Xenos Geschäfte macht, als Basis benutzt wird. Ich konnte die Kanzlerin nicht davon überzeugen, ein Schiff dorthin zu entsenden, aber ... vielleicht möchtet Ihr diesen Schurken selbst einen Höflichkeitsbesuch abstatten?"
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, in the host of Humanity there are those who are willing to grovel before our enemies in the hopes of a valuable reward. You may be interested to know that we are on the trail of such heretics..." {n}Achilleas glances at a data-slate.{/n} "Overwhelming evidence indicates that a plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt is being used as a base by a band of pirates who are not above dealing with xenos. I was unable to persuade the chancellor of the need to dispatch a ship there, but... perhaps you would like to pay a courtesy call to these scoundrels yourself?"

Ich konnte die Kanzlerin nicht davon überzeugen, ein Schiff dorthin zu entsenden, aber ... vielleicht möchtet Ihr diesen Schurken selbst einen Höflichkeitsbesuch abstatten?"

languages.text: « Malheureusement, dans le giron de l'humanité se terrent des traîtres prêts à ramper devant nos ennemis si tant est qu'ils leur promettent une récompense. Cela dit, vous serez sans doute {mf|ravi|ravie} d'apprendre que nous sommes sur les traces de ces hérétiques... » {n}Achilleas jette un coup d'œil éloquent à une plaque de données.{/n} « Nous avons des preuves irréfutables qu'une bande de pirates qui traite avec les xénos a élu domicile sur une station abandonnée de la Ceinture de Langrenn. Je n'ai pas réussi à convaincre la chancelière d'y envoyer un vaisseau, mais si l'envie vous en prend, vous pourriez rendre vous-même une petite visite de courtoisie à ces malfrats. »
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, in the host of Humanity there are those who are willing to grovel before our enemies in the hopes of a valuable reward. You may be interested to know that we are on the trail of such heretics..." {n}Achilleas glances at a data-slate.{/n} "Overwhelming evidence indicates that a plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt is being used as a base by a band of pirates who are not above dealing with xenos. I was unable to persuade the chancellor of the need to dispatch a ship there, but... perhaps you would like to pay a courtesy call to these scoundrels yourself?"

Cela dit, vous serez sans doute {mf|ravi|ravie} d'apprendre que nous sommes sur les traces de ces hérétiques... » {n}Achilleas jette un coup d'œil éloquent à une plaque de données.{/n} « Nous avons des preuves irréfutables qu'une bande de pirates qui traite avec les xénos a élu domicile sur une station abandonnée de la Ceinture de Langrenn. Je n'ai pas réussi à convaincre la chancelière d'y envoyer un vaisseau, mais si l'envie vous en prend, vous pourriez rendre vous-même une petite visite de courtoisie à ces malfrats. »

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki İnsanlığın çatısı altında, değerli armağanlar koparma umuduyla düşmanlarımızın dizlerine kapanmaya hevesli olanlar var. Bu kâfirlerin izini sürdüğümüzü bilmek isteyebilirsiniz." {n}Achilleas bir databelaya bakıyor.{/n} "Langrenn Kuşağı'ndaki yağmalanmış bir uçsuz istasyonunun, zenolarla iş birliği yapmaktan çekinmeyen bir korsan grubunca üs olarak kullanıldığına dair güçlü kanıtlar var. Şansölyeyi, oraya gemi yollamak gerektiğine ikna etmeyi başaramadım. Belki o alçaklara bizzat resmî ziyarette bulunmak istersiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, in the host of Humanity there are those who are willing to grovel before our enemies in the hopes of a valuable reward. You may be interested to know that we are on the trail of such heretics..." {n}Achilleas glances at a data-slate.{/n} "Overwhelming evidence indicates that a plundered void station in Langrenn's Belt is being used as a base by a band of pirates who are not above dealing with xenos. I was unable to persuade the chancellor of the need to dispatch a ship there, but... perhaps you would like to pay a courtesy call to these scoundrels yourself?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne yazık ki İnsanlığın çatısı altında, değerli armağanlar elde etme umuduyla düşmanlarımızın dizlerine kapanmaya hevesli olanlar var. Bu tip kâfirlerin izini sürdüğümüzü bilmek isteyebilirsiniz." {n}Achilleas bir databelaya bakıyor.{/n} "Birçok kanıt, Langrenn Kuşağı'ndaki yağmalanmış bir uçsuz istasyonunun, zenolarla iş birliği yapmaktan çekinmeyen bir korsan grubunun üssü olarak kullanıldığına işaret ediyor. Şansölyeyi oraya bir gemi göndermemizin gerekli olduğu konusunda ikna etmeyi başaramadım ancak belki bu alçaklara kendiniz bir ziyarette bulunmak istersiniz?"
